    org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction.SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY_VALUE
    Instead use SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.value or SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.byteValue() as appropriate.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.correctlySpends(Transaction, long, Script)
    Use Script.correctlySpends(Transaction, int, TransactionWitness, Coin, Script, Set) instead so that verification flags do not change as new verification options are added.
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.executeScript(Transaction, long, Script, LinkedList<byte[]>, boolean)
    Use Script.executeScript(Transaction, long, Script, LinkedList, Set) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.findKeyFromPubHash(byte[])
    Use #findKeyFromPubKeyHash(byte[], ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromKeys(NetworkParameters, List<ECKey>)
    Use Wallet.createBasic(NetworkParameters), then Wallet.importKeys(List).
    org.bitcoinj.core.LegacyAddress.fromP2SHHash(NetworkParameters, byte[])
    use LegacyAddress.fromScriptHash(NetworkParameters, byte[])
    org.bitcoinj.core.LegacyAddress.fromP2SHScript(NetworkParameters, Script)
    use LegacyAddress.fromScriptHash(NetworkParameters, byte[]) in combination with ScriptPattern.extractHashFromP2SH(Script)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromSeed(NetworkParameters, DeterministicSeed)
    Use #fromSeed(NetworkParameters, DeterministicSeed, ScriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromSeed(NetworkParameters, DeterministicSeed, ImmutableList<ChildNumber>)
    Use #fromSeed(NetworkParameters, DeterministicSeed, ScriptType, ImmutableList)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromSpendingKey(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey)
    Use #fromSpendingKey(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey, ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromWatchingKey(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey)
    Use #fromWatchingKey(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey, ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput.getAddressFromP2PKHScript(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput.getAddressFromP2SH(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.getCLTVPaymentChannelExpiry()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.getCLTVPaymentChannelRecipientPubKey()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.getCLTVPaymentChannelSenderPubKey()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction.getHash()
    use Transaction.getTxId()
    org.bitcoinj.core.LegacyAddress.getHash160()
    use LegacyAddress.getHash()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction.getHashAsString()
    use Transaction.getTxId().toString()
    org.bitcoinj.core.PeerGroup.getMemoryPool()
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.isDeterministicUpgradeRequired()
    Use #isDeterministicUpgradeRequired(ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isOpReturn()
    org.bitcoinj.core.LegacyAddress.isP2SHAddress()
    Use LegacyAddress.getOutputScriptType()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isPayToScriptHash()
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.isPubKeyHashMine(byte[])
    Use #isPubKeyHashMine(byte[], ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToAddress()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToCLTVPaymentChannel()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToMultiSig()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToRawPubKey()
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey.serializePrivate(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey.serializePublic(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.toString(boolean, boolean, boolean, AbstractBlockChain)
    Use Wallet.toString(boolean, boolean, KeyParameter, boolean, boolean, AbstractBlockChain) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.toString(boolean, KeyParameter, boolean, boolean, AbstractBlockChain)
    Use Wallet.toString(boolean, boolean, KeyParameter, boolean, boolean, AbstractBlockChain) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.upgradeToDeterministic(KeyParameter)
    Use #upgradeToDeterministic(ScriptType, KeyParameter)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Key.Type.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.Key.Type.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Key.OutputScriptType.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.Key.OutputScriptType.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.TransactionConfidence.Type.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.TransactionConfidence.Type.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.TransactionConfidence.Source.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.TransactionConfidence.Source.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Transaction.Pool.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.Transaction.Pool.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Transaction.Purpose.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.Transaction.Purpose.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Wallet.EncryptionType.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.Wallet.EncryptionType.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoin.paymentchannel.Protos.TwoWayChannelMessage.MessageType.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.TwoWayChannelMessage.MessageType.forNumber(int) instead.
    org.bitcoin.paymentchannel.Protos.Error.ErrorCode.valueOf(int)
    Use Protos.Error.ErrorCode.forNumber(int) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.bitcoinj.core.Block(NetworkParameters, byte[])
    Use MessageSerializer.makeBlock(byte[]) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.core.ChildMessage()
    Use ChildMessage.ChildMessage(NetworkParameters) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.core.ECKey(BigInteger, byte[], boolean)
    org.bitcoinj.core.ECKey(byte[], byte[])
    org.bitcoinj.core.ECKey(EncryptedData, byte[], KeyCrypter)
    org.bitcoinj.core.LegacyAddress(NetworkParameters, byte[])
    use LegacyAddress.fromPubKeyHash(NetworkParameters, byte[])
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet(Context)
    Use #createDeterministic(Context, ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet(NetworkParameters)
    Use #createDeterministic(NetworkParameters, ScriptType)
